person.persName: Henry B. Grant (Jefferson County, Kentucky, clerk, notary, and captain (U.S.A.))

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, clerk, notary, and soldier. Auburn, New York, native. Son of Lorain Grant and Betsy Grant. Married to Maria L. Richardson Grant in Louisville, Kentucky, on February 26, 1863. Father of Rebecca Grant. Resident in Cass County, Michigan, in 1850. Clerk for Northern Bank in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Notary in Louisville in 1861. Served in the twenty-seventh Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as captain from October 20, 1861, to January 1865.
